game.name: Paintball Racers
game.description:
Itâ€™s always amazing to ride a car on a unique track. Today we have brought to you a brand new racing game where you have to control a racer car in a kitchen inspired environment. Hey boys! Some other expert racers will also be there to challenge you. Practice your intense driving abilities to compete all the racers while being bombarded with the cute and colourful paint balls! Drive as fast as you can to finish the game with the maximum score possible in Paintball Racers!

You would have plenty of stunts to do like making flips in the air, riding using only one wheel, flying far away from the ground. There are multiple boosters like double ammo capacity, double turbo capacity, double carâ€™s life and double engineâ€™s power to be used. On your total score, you would see how much frags and stars you have collected during the journey. Jump, race, shoot, boost and grab as many coins as possible to complete each level like a champion in this HTML5 car race game!

Most of obstacles will be from the kitchen like knives, spoons, forks and more. Do not hesitate in shooting your competitors in case if they try to outstrip you in this fun physics hill racing game! Drive your car like a true racer to get the top position in each level! Use the turbo boost if you find your car being stopped due to any trouble! There are 20 unique and addictive levels to play through, 4 different boosters, and 4 different bullet types to use. Check out more free car games online on our website and allow yourself to enjoy with your friends without download!
